#summary Access protected functions via OAuth (rev1.0)

<h1>Access protected functions via OAuth (rev1.0)</h1>
<p>Some API functions are marked as protected. You need to
authenticate via OAuth to access these functions.<br />
See <a target="_blank" href="http://www.oauth.net">oauth.net</a> for
more details on OAuth.</p>
<p>As a developer you must register as a so called "consumer" at
car2go. Send us a E-Mail: <a href="mailto:openapi@car2go.com">openapi@car2go.com</a></p>

<a name="restrictions" ><h2>Restrictions</h2></a>
<ul>
	<li>Use HMAC-SHA1 for signing requests.</li>
	<li>We ignore callback URLs passed to request token endpoint. You
	may provide a callback URL during registration as a consumer.</li>
	<li>Access to car2go API is limited to a few calls per second (see
	<a href="#errorcodes">Error Codes</a>). Keep this in mind during
	development of your application.</li>
</ul>


<a name="endpoints" ><h2>OAuth Endpoints</h2></a>
<table>
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Name</th>
			<th>Url</th>
			<th>Note</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>

	<tr>
		<td>Get request token</td>
		<td>[https://www.car2go.com/api/reqtoken]</td>
		<td>Token is valid for some hours.</td>
	</tr>

	<tr>
		<td>Authorize token</td>
		<td>[https://www.car2go.com/api/authorize]</td>
		<td>Pass request token as parameter, e.g. "?oauth_token=[token]"</td>
	</tr>

	<tr>
		<td>Get access token</td>
		<td>[https://www.car2go.com/api/accesstoken]</td>
		<td>Token is valid for about one month. User can revoke token via
		car2go portal.</td>
	</tr>

</table>
